languages.text: "Коллектив Амарнат был сотворен группой техножрецов, отказавшихся от индивидуальности и объединившихся в коллективный разум. Разум, мыслящий алгоритмически, но руководствующийся принципами и убеждениями праведного духа. Супер-эго, на шаг приблизившее их к Омниссии".

"The Amarnat Collective was created by a group of Tech-Priests who renounced individuality and merged into a hivemind. A mind that reasoned algorithmically but was guided by the principles and convictions of a righteous spirit. A superego that brought them one step closer to the Omnissiah."
languages.original_text: "Коллектив Амарнат был сотворен группой техножрецов, отказавшихся от индивидуальности и объединившихся в коллективный разум. Разум, мыслящий алгоритмически, но руководствующийся принципами и убеждениями праведного духа. Супер-эго, на шаг приблизившее их к Омниссии".

traits.locale_text: "The Amarnat Collective was created by a group of Tech-Priests who renounced their individual personhoods to merge into a hivemind. A mind that reasoned algorithmically but was guided by the principles and convictions of a righteous spirit. A superego that brought them a step closer to the Omnissiah."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: 「アマルナト集合体は、人格を放棄してハイヴ・マインドと合体した技術司祭の一団が作り出した。アルゴリズムで判断し、正義の魂が持つ原則と信念に導かれた精神。技術司祭たちを万機神に一歩近づける超自我」
languages.original_text: "The Amarnat Collective was created by a group of Tech-Priests who renounced individuality and merged into a hivemind. A mind that reasoned algorithmically but was guided by the principles and convictions of a righteous spirit. A superego that brought them one step closer to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: 「アマルナト集合体は、人格を放棄してハイヴ・マインドと合体した技術司祭の一団が作り出した。アルゴリズムで判断し、正義の魂が持つ原則と信念に導かれた精神。技術司祭たちを万機神に一歩近づける超自我」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: “阿玛纳特聚合意识是由一群技术神甫构架出来的。他们舍弃了各自的个性，融入了聚合意识之中。他们的思维建立于算法推理之上，由正义精神的原则与信念所引导。他们通过组成这样的超我意识，从而更加接近欧姆尼塞亚。”
languages.original_text: "The Amarnat Collective was created by a group of Tech-Priests who renounced individuality and merged into a hivemind. A mind that reasoned algorithmically but was guided by the principles and convictions of a righteous spirit. A superego that brought them one step closer to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: “阿玛纳特聚合意识是由一群技术祭司构架出来的。他们舍弃了各自的个性，融入了聚合意识之中。他们的思维建立于算法推理之上，由正义精神的原则与信念所引导。他们通过组成这样的超我意识，从而更加接近欧姆尼塞亚。”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: « Le collectif Amarnat a été créé par un groupe de technoprêtres qui a renoncé à l'individualité pour former une intelligence collective. Une intelligence algorithmique, mais guidée par les principes et convictions qui animent les esprits des justes. Un surmoi qui leur a permis d'approcher l'Omnimessie d'un peu plus près. »
languages.original_text: "The Amarnat Collective was created by a group of Tech-Priests who renounced individuality and merged into a hivemind. A mind that reasoned algorithmically but was guided by the principles and convictions of a righteous spirit. A superego that brought them one step closer to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: « Le collectif Amarnat a été créé par un groupe de technoprêtres qui a renoncé à l'individualité pour former une intelligence collective. Une intelligence algorithmique, mais guidée par les principes et convictions qui animent les esprits des justes. Un surmoi qui leur a permis d'approcher l'Omnimessie d'un peu plus près. »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: «El Colectivo Amarnat fue creado por un grupo de tecnosacerdotes que renunciaron a obrar por su cuenta y se unieron para crear una mente colmena. Esta mente razonaba con algoritmos, pero seguía los principios y convicciones de un espíritu justo. Un superego que los ayudó a establecer un contacto más cercano con el Omnissiah».
languages.original_text: "The Amarnat Collective was created by a group of Tech-Priests who renounced individuality and merged into a hivemind. A mind that reasoned algorithmically but was guided by the principles and convictions of a righteous spirit. A superego that brought them one step closer to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: «El Colectivo Amarnat fue creado por un grupo de tecnosacerdotes que renunciaron a obrar por su cuenta y se unieron para crear una mente colmena. Esta mente razonaba con algoritmos, pero seguía los principios y convicciones de un espíritu justo. Un superego que los ayudó a establecer un contacto más cercano con el Omnissiah».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Das Amarnat-Kollektiv wurde von einer Gruppe von Techpriestern erschaffen, die der Individualität abgeschworen und sich zu einem Schwarmverstand verschmolzen haben. Einem Verstand, der algorithmisch urteilte, aber von den Grundsätzen und Überzeugungen eines rechtschaffenen Geists geleitet wurde. Einem Superego, das sie dem Omnissiah einen Schritt näher brachte."
languages.original_text: "The Amarnat Collective was created by a group of Tech-Priests who renounced individuality and merged into a hivemind. A mind that reasoned algorithmically but was guided by the principles and convictions of a righteous spirit. A superego that brought them one step closer to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: "Das Amarnat-Kollektiv wurde von einer Gruppe von Techpriestern erschaffen, die der Individualität abgeschworen und sich zu einem Schwarmverstand verschmolzen haben. Einem Verstand, der algorithmisch urteilte, aber von den Grundsätzen und Überzeugungen eines rechtschaffenen Geists geleitet wurde. Einem Superego, das sie dem Omnissiah einen Schritt näher brachte."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Amarnat Bütünlüğü, bireyselliği reddeden ve birleşip kolektif bir zihin meydana getiren bir grup Tekno Rahip tarafından yaratıldı. Algoritmik bir mantığa sahip ancak doğrucu bir ruhun prensipleriyle ve kararlılığıyla hareket eden bir zihin. Onları Hermesih'e bir adım daha yaklaştıran bir süper ego."
languages.original_text: "The Amarnat Collective was created by a group of Tech-Priests who renounced individuality and merged into a hivemind. A mind that reasoned algorithmically but was guided by the principles and convictions of a righteous spirit. A superego that brought them one step closer to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: "Amarnat Bütünlüğü, bireyselliği reddeden ve birleşip kolektif bir zihin hâline gelen bir grup Tekno Rahip tarafından yaratılmıştır. Algoritmik bir mantığa sahip ancak doğrucu bir ruhun prensipleri ve kararlılığıyla hareket eden bir zihin. Onları Hermesih'e bir adım daha yaklaştıran bir süper ego."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
